auth.welcomeBack: Welcome back! Please log in to your account.
auth.createAccountPrompt: Create an account to start your journey.

dashboard.getQuotePrompt: Click the button to get your personalized quote for today.

gratitude.title: What are you grateful for today?

goalsPage.title: Goals & Milestones
goalsPage.description: Break down your long-term ambitions into smaller, manageable tasks. Add goals, then create tasks for each one to track your progress.
goalsPage.noGoalsDescription: Add your first goal above to get started.
goalsPage.noTasks: No tasks yet. Add one to get started!

goalDetail.descriptionLabel: What does achieving this goal feel like?
goalDetail.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the feeling of accomplishment, the pride, the joy...
goalDetail.examplesLabel: What are some examples of this goal in action?
goalDetail.examplesPlaceholder: e.g., 'Presenting confidently in a meeting', 'Running a 5k without stopping'
goalDetail.characteristicsDescription: Who must you become to achieve this goal?

chat.title: Discussing: "{goal}"
chat.initialMessage: This is a great goal! What's the first thing that comes to mind when you think about achieving it?

characteristicsSuggester.title: AI-Powered Suggestions
characteristicsSuggester.description: Here are some characteristics the AI thinks might help you. Select any you'd like to add.
characteristicsSuggester.fetchError: Could not fetch suggestions. Please try again.

decisionMatrixPage.title: Decision Matrix
decisionMatrixPage.description: Identify limiting beliefs, decide on new empowering ones, and gather evidence to support them.
decisionMatrixPage.newDecisionPlaceholder: e.g., 'I am capable and I will try my best.'
decisionMatrixPage.noEntries: No entries yet. Add one to start reframing your thoughts!

toasts.quoteError: Could not generate a quote. Please try again.
toasts.suggestionError: Could not get an initial suggestion. Please try again.
toasts.chatResponseError: Failed to get a-zA-Z'. Please try again.
toasts.taskAdded: New task added to your goal.
